Indication: Chickens ~ turkeys ~ and pheasants - For increased rate of weight gain and improved feed efficiency
SpecialConsiderations: The quantities of antibiotics are expressed in terms of the equivalent amount of antibiotic standard.

Indication: Broiler and replacement chickens ~ growing turkeys ~ and growing pheasants - For increased rate of weight gain and improved feed efficiency
SpecialConsiderations: The quantities of antibiotics are expressed in terms of the equivalent amount of antibiotic standard.

Indication: Chickens - For increased egg production and improved feed efficiency for egg production
SpecialConsiderations: The quantities of antibiotics are expressed in terms of the equivalent amount of antibiotic standard.

Indication: Broiler chickens - As an aid in the prevention of necrotic enteritis caused or complicated by Clostridium spp. or other organisms susceptible to bacitracin. Replacement chickens - As an aid in the prevention of necrotic enteritis caused or complicated by Clostridium spp. or other organisms susceptible to bacitracin
SpecialConsiderations: The quantities of antibiotics are expressed in terms of the equivalent amount of antibiotic standard.

Indication: Broiler chickens - As an aid in the control of necrotic enteritis caused or complicated by Clostridium spp. or other organisms susceptible to bacitracin. Replacement chickens - As an aid in the control of necrotic enteritis caused or complicated by Clostridium spp. or other organisms susceptible to bacitracin
Limitations: Feed continuously as sole ration. Start at first clinical signs of disease ~ vary dosage based on severity of infection ~ administer continuously for 5 to 7 days or as long as clinical signs persist ~ then reduce medication to prevention level (50 g/ton)
SpecialConsiderations: The quantities of antibiotics are expressed in terms of the equivalent amount of antibiotic standard.
